page.title: 18Health Care in Hellesdon
page.content: There are many health care groups eg. British Diabetic Association, Red Cross and St. Johns Ambulance. An infant welfare clinic is held at the community centre,and also a Chiropodist has sessions for pensioners.Doctors Onley, Morgan, Matthews & Stone work in the Reepham Rd. practice.There is also a dentist,Mr R.W.Betts who takes private patients on Saturdays.There is a short- term residential home for the old called The Ethel Tipple Court.The Limes & Nortgate House are also residential homes but they are long term. There is a Welfare Association for the old people,and a Mother Craft Group.So from the cradle to the grave Hellesdon looks after it's folk.
